whole_object: It seems the bar stools are so engaging, even the shadows can't resist sitting down for a pint.
single_object:
- Bar counter: This bar counter's so polished, it reflects better on you than a room full of mirrors!
- Bar stools: These bar stools must moonlight as magicians – every time I sit, my worries disappear!
multi_object:
- Bar counter  
- Bar stools  
- The bar counter is so polished, it could double as a runway for bar stools strutting their stuff!  

- Bar stools  
- Bar counter  
- These bar stools are so supportive, they should start a motivational podcast with the bar counter as their co-host!
